title: Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 9434: Build ID 9394753
body: This is the pull request automatically created by the OneLocBuild task in the build process to check-in localized files generated based upon translation source files (.lcl files) handed-back from the downstream localization pipeline. If there are issues in translations, visit https://aka.ms/icxLocBug and log bugs for fixes. The OneLocBuild wiki is https://aka.ms/onelocbuild and the localization process in general is documented at https://aka.ms/AllAboutLoc.

commit.message: Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 9434: Build ID 9347357
Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 9434: Build ID 9347357
Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 9434: Build ID 9394753
Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 9434: Build ID 9394753
Remove spurious `Ł` character in Italian version string

nodes.body:
Hello! I noticed that you're targeting one of our servicing branches. Please consider updating the version.
<!-- Policy app identification https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=PullRequestIssueManagement. -->

@rainersigwald , could you clarify if we can merge this pr?
cc: @surayya-MS
I don't expect the QB to be interested in an insertion with _only_ these small loc changes. IMO we should wait to see if we have another change (and we probably do in #9974) and possibly take both.
I distinctly remember fixing this this recently. I'm going to manually override this because the regression bugs me.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -162,7 +162,7 @@ Questo flag è sperimentale e potrebbe non funzionare come previsto.
       </trans-unit>
       <trans-unit id="MSBuildVersionMessage">
         <source>MSBuild version {0} for {1}</source>
-        <target state="translated">Versione di MSBuild {0} per {1}</target>
+        <target state="translated">Versione di MSBuild Ł{0} per {1}</target>
